Key: I-Is this okay?

Mm. All that's left is to get the towel and gently
wipe down his body.
G-Gently, right?

(Wh-What? What's going on?
I'm super self-conscious...)
Now... Let's get his temperature, too.
What? Shouldn't it be afterwards...?
...Shin, open wide.
Huh? O-Okay... Ahh...
(Ah! Reine-san's cleavage is too close!)

(I immediately looked away, and saw Tohka
moving the towel over my skin and blushing
furiously...)

(Every time Tohka moved the towel, it tickled my
body. I felt like I would make a weird sound at
any moment.)

Sh-Shido! Are you okay?! I'm sorry, I may have
touched your old wounds.
N-No, it's not that—
I-I know! I need to wash you more gently, right?
Ah! S-Sorry! Then... why don't I wipe you here?
N-No, not there...!

Hmm, this place is weak, too... Shido, your whole
body is injured...
It's all my fault. Forgive me, Shido...
N-No! It's not like that. Don't worry.
R-Really?! Then let me wipe you more—
N-No... Don't do it anym—?!

Oh, Tohka... For your first time,
you're doing a good job.

R-Really?! It seems like it's good to keep the
body clean!
*Pant*...*pant*... Th-Thanks, Tohka! I'm...
Tohka, I think you left a spot over there.
Hm? That way?! Got it!
K-Kotori... you—!
Sh-Shido...san... A-Are you okay...?
I'm not f—
It's totally fine! A perfect harem situation\nfor the lucky, perverted Shido-kun.
(*Grunt*! Y-Yoshinon...!)
(O-Oh no... I... can't...)
(T-Take it...)
*Wheeze*...*pant*...*wheeze*...*pant*...

Hm... When I took your temperature at the
Fraxinus, you were normal... but it seems as
though you're starting to develop a fever.
You probably should rest more...

(...This is poisonous. In so many different ways.
I'm sure my fever went up for other reasons...)

Yeah... Then let's return to the Fraxinus. We have
to examine Tohka and the girls, too.

K-Kotori... You totally knew what would happen,
and you just let it happen, didn't you...?
My, I have no idea what you're talking about.
(What does she think her brother is...?)

I'm going to head back... Well, Shin...
You take care now.
O-Okay...

Shido, you seem worse than earlier...
Are you really okay?
Y-Yeah... I'm fine, I think. Um... Thanks, Tohka.
Yeah, whenever you need help, let me know!
Hahaha... haha...
Man, we might have overdone it.\nSorry, Shido-kun～
I-I'm sorry...
Hm? Don't worry about it. Thanks for visiting.

I-If you ever need anything...
please let me know...
That's right, Shido-kun.\nWe need to help one another!
Thanks, you two.

O-Oh... Sh-Shido-san... P-Please... don't push...
yourself...

Yeah, got it. I hope your checkup goes well,
Yoshino.
Th-Thank you.
See ya!

Shido... I'll look into what happened this time,
so you be sure to not do anything reckless
on your own anymore, okay?
O-Okay...
You can't rely on my powers right now...
Hm? What did you say, Kotori?
Nothing. Later, Shido. Get some sleep.
Yeah, I will.
(Gosh...)
(I let out a big sigh and stared at the ceiling.)

(I couldn't get that last image of Kotori out of
my mind. She seemed so worried.)

Now that everyone's gone, I feel lonely...
Is that really sappy?

(At the end of the day, I realize spending time
with them is really precious. All this chaos has
become the norm.)

(In order for me to be able to stay with them,
I'll need to recover as quickly as possible...)
(Hm... I wonder what time it is...)

(I woke up and looked at the clock. It seemed
I had been asleep for a few hours.)

(Come to think of it, I wonder how Origami's
doing. She wasn't here to check up on me...)

(Things got twisted when Origami thought Kotori
murdered her parents...)

(I haven't been able to talk to her lately...
I wonder if she hates me now...)

(I know it's selfish of me... but I wonder if
there's any way that Origami and Kotori...
no, all the Spirits, could get along...)
I wish... Origami would pay me a visit...

(Hm...? Come to think of it... There's one more
person who hasn't come by to visit...)
(Uh... Who... was it...?)
(As I thought hard, I drifted off into sleep.)
Hmm...?
Wh-What the?!
There's something in my bed?!
O-Origami?!
What?
Wh-Wh-What are you doing?!
Paying you a visit.
Huh... P-Paying me a visit?
I heard that you are now accepting visitors.

O-Oh, I see... Thanks.
Hey, wait! No! How did you get in, Origami?!
From the balcony.
Th-That's trespassing.
Not if you don't tell anyone.
Y-You know...

(This is Origami Tobiichi. She's my classmate and
the super prodigy of Raizen High School.)

(Her grades are always ranked number one in the
class, let alone the country. To top it off, she's
athletic and basically a perfect all-rounder.)

(Her pale skin and unreadable expression give her
a mysterious vibe. She seems a bit
intimidating...)

(Last year, she made it into the top three of the
school's unofficial Dream Girlfriend" rankings.)"
(However, she's earned the nickname Permafrost"

Operator: from being such a hard-to-get cool girl...

Key:
(But... that could all be wrong. You see, she's
in the AST, an anti-Spirit division of the
Self Defense Force.)

(Tohka, Yoshino, Kurumi, and Kotori... Origami has
battled them all, in order to defeat the Spirit
that killed her parents.)

(And recently, the culprit was thought to be my
sister, Kotori... so I had to fight against her.)

(Somehow, Origami listened to me and we were able
to avoid the worst, but... I haven't spoken to her
since then.)
Hey, wait!
Hey! Uhhhhh! O-Origami-san?! What are you doing?!
Paying you a visit.
That's not what I mean!

It's a well-known remedy for this kind of
situation to warm the patient by
skin-on-skin contact.
Is that a popular thing now or something?
(I literally just heard the same thing earlier!)
Anyways, just don't take your clothes off!
...Why not?

Because I said so! Just, no taking off clothes
allowed!

It sure seems noisy... Shido, are you up?
Are you involved in something sk—
K-Kotori?!

...What are you doing? Hurry up and
get away from Shido.

W-Wait, Origami! Please...
can you calm down? P-Please?
...What's the meaning of this?

Sh-She's paying me a visit, that's all! I was out
for so long, she came to check in on me!
Right, Origami?
Yes. What Shido said.

Really... I never knew paying a visit meant
sneaking in through the balcony like some kind of
burglar. Must be some kind of new slang.
K-Kotori!

Efreet, I didn't come today to fight you.
Paying Shido a visit is more important.
Hmph. It's so kind of you to spare me today...
You guys!

(I... I shouldn't let them be in the
same room any longer!)
O-Origami! Just go home for today!
Shido...? What are yo—

Right?! You do that! Thanks for paying me a visit!
I appreciate it! Later! Bye!
Phew...

...Despite your current condition, you even found
a way to hit on Origami Tobiichi. You sure are an
idiot.
N-No I wasn't! I-I wasn't looking for anything!
Uh-huh...
...Well, I believe you.
R-Really?

Why are you so surprised? I'd know more than
anyone that you don't have the guts to do it.
Oof...
But I guess that's typical Shid—Stupid Shido...
Why do you have to go out of your way to say it?!

Listen to me, Shido. I want you to think hard with
your tiny hermit crab brain.

Oh, Vice Commander Kannazuki-san said that it's
not a crab brain, it's actually an intestine...
Did you say something?
N-No, nothing...

Now, I need to talk to you about what I came here
for. Seems like we're involved in something big.
Well, the whole of Tengu City is.
The whole of Tengu City? What do you mean?

We detected a very strong spiritual wave large
enough to affect the whole city.
Does that mean...

A Spirit may be involved... There's a big
possibility of that. But...
...But?

As long as we don't know for sure, it can be
anything. There's a chance that it was a Realizer
experiment conducted by the AST...
AST?!

(Ratatoskr and the AST are the only ones using the
Realizer in Tengu City. There's a big chance they
were experimenting. Then, that means Origami—)

But I think it's hard for the AST to emit
a frequency that significant.
I see...

No time to feel relieved. It doesn't change
the fact that something is happening.

And besides... I'm thinking there's a correlation
between that and your body losing Spirit powers.
What...? No way.

It's too close in timing to say it's a
coincidence. There are no abnormalities in you
that would explain it, are there?
You have a point...

Well, it's all a hypothesis at the moment.
Now that I can't get ahold of the higher-ups,
I can't come to an easy conclusion.
What? You can't get ahold of them?

No, I can't get in touch with any of the
higher-ups at Ratatoskr.
D-Don't you think that's a pretty big deal?

I do, but I'm not dumb enough to deny the
reality that's happening in front of me.
I see...

We're able to conduct some investigations with
just the Fraxinus. I'm going to do what I can,
as much as possible.
I see...
(Seriously, what is going on?)
Shido... That girl... still seems to be outside.
Wh-Why are you telling me...?

Anyways, Shido. You work on making sure the
Spirits are as stable as they can be.

I know it won't resolve the main issue, but you
can at least limit the chances of them going
berserk.
...It's noisy outside, so I'm leaving.
O-Okay...
